SELECT admission.admission_nm , exam.type_nm , exam.exam_cd , exam.exam_nm , exam.exam_date , exam.exam_time , hall.head_nm , hall.bldg_nm , hall.hall_nm , hall.hall_cd , sheet.scorer_nm , sheet.sheet_no , sheet.reg_dttm , sheet.cancel_dttm FROM sheet INNER JOIN exam ON exam.exam_cd = sheet.exam_cd INNER JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = sheet.hall_cd INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = exam.admission_cd
AND sheet.cancel_dttm IS NOT NULL AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND exam.exam_date = #{param.examDate} AND exam.exam_time = #{param.examTime} AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm} AND sheet.sheet_no = #{param.sheetNo} AND sheet.scorer_nm LIKE '%' #{param.scorerNm} '%'

SELECT admission.admission_nm , exam.type_nm , exam.exam_date , exam.exam_time , examinee.dept_nm , examinee.major_nm , exam.exam_nm , hall.head_nm , hall.bldg_nm , hall.hall_nm , examinee.examinee_cd , exam_map.virt_no , score.scorer_nm , COUNT(*) AS update_cnt FROM exam_map INNER JOIN exam ON exam_map.exam_cd = exam.exam_cd INNER JOIN admission ON exam.admission_cd = admission.admission_cd INNER JOIN hall ON exam_map.hall_cd = hall.hall_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON exam_map.examinee_cd = examinee.examinee_cd INNER JOIN score ON exam_map.exam_cd = score.exam_cd AND exam_map.virt_no = score.virt_no
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND exam.exam_nm = #{param.examNm} AND exam.exam_date = #{param.examDate} AND exam.exam_time = #{param.examTime} AND examinee.major_nm = #{param.majorNm} AND examinee.dept_nm = #{param.deptNm} AND exam_map.virt_no = #{param.virtNo} AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm} AND score.scorer_nm LIKE '%' #{param.scorerNm} '%'
GROUP BY exam.exam_nm , exam.type_nm , exam.exam_date , exam.exam_time , examinee.dept_nm , examinee.major_nm , hall.head_nm , hall.bldg_nm , hall.hall_nm , exam_map.virt_no , score.scorer_nm HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
